text:
Biden’s energy crisis is costing the average American household an extra $2,000 per year. 

Since taking office, prices have DOUBLED at the pump - and with this admin’s attack on American energy production, prices will continue to climb. https://t.co/2N97coSBDt

Today marks the 78th anniversary of D-Day.

The bravery and sacrifice of all those who landed on the beaches of Normandy to fight to free Europe and the world from Nazi tyranny will never be forgotten. https://t.co/GALjMBNFPt

Record high inflation has continued to shrink folks paychecks each month.

And with over half of small businesses reporting job openings - along with losing jobs three of the past four months - Biden’s economic crisis is trending towards a recession. https://t.co/kb52IeNLV8

Biden and Congressional Dems overstimulated the economy through their radical big government policies, and hardworking Americans continue to feel the pinch as a result.

The responsibility of causing this inflation crisis lies solely at the feet of Joe Biden. https://t.co/jyAPMYdsXw
